languages.text: "Место, где мы оказались, так долго было укрыто варп-штормами, что данных о его исследовании почти не сохранилось. Я встречал в дневниках предшественников лишь скупые упоминания, что здесь таится нечто невообразимо опасное..."
"This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."
languages.original_text: "Место, где мы оказались, так долго было укрыто варп-штормами, что данных о его исследовании почти не сохранилось. Я встречал в дневниках предшественников лишь скупые упоминания, что здесь таится нечто невообразимо опасное..."

traits.locale_text: "The place we find ourselves in has been hidden by the warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

"The place we find ourselves in has been hidden by the warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

"The place we find ourselves in has been obscured by the warp storms for so long, that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

"The place we find ourselves in has been obscured by the warp storms for so long, that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."
"This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."
"This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

languages.text: «Este sitio lleva tanto tiempo oculto por las tormentas de disformidad que no quedan datos sobre su exploración. Los diarios de mis predecesores mencionan brevemente que hay algo extremadamente peligroso...».
languages.original_text: "This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

traits.locale_text: «El lugar en el que estamos lleva tanto tiempo oculto por las tormentas de disformidad que no quedan datos sobre su exploración. Los diarios de mis predecesores mencionan brevemente que hay algo extremadamente peligroso...».

languages.text: « Cet endroit est occulté par des tempêtes Warp depuis si longtemps qu'il ne reste plus aucune donnée d'exploration. Les journaux de mes prédécesseurs font brièvement mention d'un danger inimaginable... »
languages.original_text: "This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

traits.locale_text: « L'endroit où nous nous trouvons est obscurci par des tempêtes Warp depuis si longtemps qu'il ne reste plus aucune donnée d'exploration. Les journaux de mes prédécesseurs font brièvement mention d'un danger inimaginable... »

languages.text: 「ここは〈歪み〉の嵐に覆われており、探査に関するデータは残っちゃいない。前任者の日誌に、ここには何か想像を絶する恐ろしい物が潜んでいる、と手短に書かれていたが…」
languages.original_text: "This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちがいる場所は〈歪み〉の嵐に覆われて、探査に関するデータは残っちゃいない。前任者の日誌に、ここには何か想像を絶する恐ろしい物が潜んでいる、と手短に書かれていたが…」

languages.text: “这个地方已经被亚空间风暴遮蔽了太长时间。关于这个地方，所有的数据都已经失效了。我以前的那些行商浪人简短地提起过这里，说这里潜伏着某种难以想象的危险……”
languages.original_text: "This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

traits.locale_text: “我们所在的这个地方，已经被亚空间风暴遮蔽了太长时间。关于这个地方，所有的数据都已经失效了。我以前的那些行商浪人简短地提起过这里，说这里潜伏着某种难以想象的危险……”

languages.text: "Dieses Gebiet lag so lange in Warpstürmen verborgen, dass keinerlei Daten über seine Erkundung mehr existieren. Die Tagebücher meiner Vorgänger erwähnen nur kurz, dass hier etwas unvorstellbar Gefährliches lauert ..."
languages.original_text: "This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."

traits.locale_text: "Der Ort, an dem wir uns befinden, lag so lange in Warpstürmen verborgen, dass keinerlei Daten über seine Erkundung mehr existieren. Die Tagebücher meiner Vorgänger erwähnen nur kurz, dass hier etwas unvorstellbar Gefährliches lauert ..."

languages.text: "Bu bölge o kadar uzun süredir öteboyut fırtınalarınca gizli kalmış ki keşfiyle ilgili elde hiçbir veri kalmamış. Öncüllerimin günlüklerinde tek söylenen şey, burada akıl almaz derecede tehlikeli bir şeyin kol gezdiği."
languages.original_text: "This area has been obscured by warp storms for so long that no data about its exploration remains. The diaries of my predecessors briefly mention that something unimaginably dangerous lurks here..."
